org.apache.hama.bsp.sync

Class ZooKeeperSyncClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.sync.ZKSyncClient
      • org.apache.hama.bsp.sync.ZooKeeperSyncClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PeerSyncClient, SyncClient, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

    public class ZooKeeperSyncClientImpl
extends ZKSyncClient
implements PeerSyncClient
    This client class abstracts the use of our zookeeper sync code.

        BSPJobID jobId,
        TaskAttemptID taskId)
          throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: PeerSyncClient
        Init will be called within a spawned task, it should be used to initialize the inner structure and fields, e.G. a zookeeper client or an rpc connection to the real sync daemon.

      • getAllPeerNames

        public String[] getAllPeerNames(BSPJobID jobID)
        Description copied from interface: PeerSyncClient
        Returns all registered tasks within the sync daemon. They have to be ordered ascending by their task id.
        Specified by:
        getAllPeerNames in interface PeerSyncClient
        Parameters:
        jobID - the job ID
        Returns:
        an ordered string array of host:port pairs of all tasks connected to the daemon.
